title: 有冇人覺得白人會最先絕種

replies.msg:
白人對種族差異較開放
經常見到白人配黑人既情侶
但最尾生左個brown既細路
而且白人生育率較低
最後世界可能白人成為少數人
有冇人認同

定

對於白人既定義已經唔同
我上面打左點先算白人

The reason is because the white people of the white nations ( United States, the European Union, Canada, Australia) aren't having enough children to sustain replacement level( about 2.11 children per family), which shortly means, more white people die than white babies are born. Most white nations have an average birthrate of 1.3 children per family.

Also, all of the white nations are receiving mass immigration to make up for the disappearance of the workforce, which in time, with increasing minorities and decreasing white births, will make them minorities. Note that practically all white countries and only white countries are encouraging mass immigration. While Asia will stay Asian, Africa stay African, possibly no place on earth will be white.

Today, whites make up only 8 (2 percent of these are women in child baring age) percent of the whole planet population, comparatively to 28 percent in the 1950, and it is decreasing every decade.

hi nigga

天生金髮藍眼白人 可能最先絕種
宜家好多白人金髮都係染出黎
金髮碧眼既基因好容易被溝淡，白人既未來應該會係類似波斯或者印度北部既人，擁有白人既輪廓但膚色髪色眼珠全部都同棕色人種一樣，因為呢班人歷史上都係同其他白人同宗，但同土著居民融合得最耐

樓上兩個都講得啱，依家已經溝淡

個情況應該係越嚟越淡，但唔會無咗「白人」得返黃同黑
